Bearcat.name: Bearcat
Bearcat.description:
A revitalized bow, reloaded as part of an Attack Action.

+1 to Attack.

Boomer Buster.name: Boomer Buster
Boomer Buster.description: A very heavy pistol. It can't be concealed. +1 to Attack.

City Reaper.name: City Reaper
City Reaper.description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Home Defender.name: Home Defender
Home Defender.description: An all-purpose shotgun. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Hotshot.name: Hotshot
Hotshot.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage. +1 to Attack.

Hunter.name: Hunter
Hunter.description: A crossbow which must be reloaded after every attack. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Jungle Reaper.name: Jungle Reaper
Jungle Reaper.description: A standard-issue assault rifle. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Long Rifle.name: Long Rifle
Long Rifle.description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine.

Magnum.name: Magnum
Magnum.description: A concealable, heavy pistol. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Mini-Grenade.name: Mini-Grenade
Mini-Grenade.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this.

P-35.name: P-35
P-35.description: A very heavy pistol. It can't be concealed.

Scorpion.name: Scorpion
Scorpion.description:
A crossbow, reloaded as part of an Attack Action.

+1 to Attack.

Sherwood.name: Sherwood
Sherwood.description: A revitalized bow that must be reloaded after every attack. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

SMG-21.name: SMG-21
SMG-21.description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed.

Snipe-Star.name: Snipe-Star
Snipe-Star.description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Streetmaster.name: Streetmaster
Streetmaster.description: A concealable, medium-sized pistol. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Striker.name: Striker
Striker.description: A crossbow, reloaded as part of an Attack Action.

Super Chief.name: Super Chief
Super Chief.description: A very heavy pistol. It can't be concealed. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Tech-Assault III.name: Tech-Assault III
Tech-Assault III.description: A concealable SMG. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Tomcat.name: Tomcat
Tomcat.description: A revitalized bow, reloaded as part of an Attack Action.

Type-18.name: Type-18
Type-18.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this. +1 to Attack.

Type-G.name: Type-G
Type-G.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Type-R.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Urban.name: Urban
Urban.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage.

Viper.name: Viper
Viper.description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed. +1 to Attack.
